Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: [to webcam] Hello. My name's Oscar. I'm an accountant in Scranton, Pennsylvania and I'm gay. And I'm here to tell you that yes- it does get better. When I was younger, um-

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: What's he doing?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: He's searching out younger gays.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Oh.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: No, it's just a way to tell young people, no matter how hard it gets for them, there's a brighter future ahead.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: ...with you. [chuckles]

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: No matter how hard it gets for you, eh- Kelly, seriously, I-

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Just keep chatting. I'm just checking my makeup in your webcam.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Do you not own a mirror?

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Webcams make me look the way I do in my fantasies.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I know, right? What is it? You always look so good in those things.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: I'm throwing out all my mirrors.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Okay, as you can see, I now have a cool job at a dynamic workplace. Being gay is a celebration of life, it's a simple-

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: No, I'm sorry, I just can't sit idly by and have the gay youth of America misled by some reductionist-

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: It's not misleading.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: -pep talk. Sexuality is a spectrum. It's a paradox to think of any sexual activity as "normal." It gets better but it also gets vastly more complicated.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Hey, Robert, that guy, he looks just like you. [Robert backs into Kevin's nose] Ooh! [whimpers]

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Ow! Damn it, Kevin! God!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You okay, Robert?

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Fine.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Put some ice on it.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: In any case, it gets better. [Kevin cries] Maybe- maybe not much better... but better.

Quote.Speaker: Sasha
Quote.Text: One, two, three!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I wanted to give a nice gift to the tenants in the building. At first I thought, "muffin basket." Then I thought, "What's even more precious to people than muffins?"

Quote.Speaker: Jake
Quote.Text: Can you just smile, please?

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: I don't want to!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: ...their own children.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hey everybody, just a few hours left for the free family portrait studio. Darryl. We'd love to see little Jada come by. Angela? Why don't you bring by your little angel?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: No thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Jim, you've got those two cute kids. We sure would love to see them.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I know why you're doing this, Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Last week, I may have gone too far. I'll explain it quickly. Basically, I found out where he gets his clothes dry-cleaned. Custom ordered the same suit, made with tear-away Velcro. And... you can fill in the rest.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [Jim rips off his clothes] Wha-? [Stanley laughs] Damn it, Jim!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Now he's trying to get me to bring my children in to work. I think it's fair to be cautious.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Let me get this straight. You lost all of it. All your winnings. A hundred and fifty thousand dollars.

Quote.Speaker: Hide
Quote.Text: Bad economy. Bad investment.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: You mean to tell me no one wanted an energy drink for Asian homosexuals?

Quote.Speaker: Calvin
Quote.Text: They did not.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: And you got half a million of these? Well I gotta try it.

Quote.Speaker: Calvin
Quote.Text: I wouldn't.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Aw, come on. What's the harm? [makes face] Mmm. What flavor was that?

Quote.Speaker: Hide
Quote.Text: Coconut penis.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: The coconut's pretty subtle.

Quote.Speaker: Calvin
Quote.Text: Come on, man. Can't you just give us a yes or a no?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I don't know, man. Y'all quit with a lot of confidence. I mean, it was like, y'all came up in here dancing and everybody was- [sees Val] ooh, hold on a second. [sees Brandon] Oh.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: If I were Val, I would break up with Brandon. Then I would date the hell out of me. I wouldn't give in to me too fast, let me buy myself some nice dinners and such. But when I finally did give in, I would go crazy on myself.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [wearing janitor outfit] Hi guys.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: How's it going, man?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [whimpering] I'm- I'm good, thank you. And how are you?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Great, yeah, good.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: Oh, how the mediocre have fallen.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Oh God.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Look, I'm not here to get my old job back. I had my opportunity, I blew it, I'm moving on. I just wanted to come in here and literally beg you for something, anything. I will sweep the floors, water the plants...

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: No, you don't understand-

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Clean the toilets.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: I don't need anyone to-

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Pull the poop out of the toilets.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: That's not even a thing.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Just, please...

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Andy.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Please!

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Andy.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Give me something!

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Why don't you clean the carpets for today?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: You're welcome. Up you get then. Pick yourself up. There it is.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: You don't need to-

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I have a delicious secret.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Good, good. This carpet's overdue for a good mopping.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Is a mop the most efficient tool to use on a carpet?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah, it is actually.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Mmm, I can't hold it in any longer. Um, I am faking this, okay? Because I convinced David Wallace to buy Dunder Mifflin back from Sabre. And at three o'clock today he's gonna walk in here and reinstate me as manager.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [enters with the kids] Family picture!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Pam? No!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: What? Honey, we talked about this.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No, we talked about not bringing them in to Dwight's photo studio slash trap.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yes, and then we decided that was crazy.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No, we decided it was crazy not to worry about it.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No, we settled in a much more rational place, remember?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Nope.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: We decided that there's no way Dwight would harm a child.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: But are you a hundred percent sure? I don't think any of us are.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No, no.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Nope.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: But it's free. And we'll keep our eye on them.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: That's-

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yes!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: That's-

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: And we'll make sure Dwight doesn't do anything C-R-A-Z-Y.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Wait, C-R-A-Z...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Great, right up there.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah. You just sit right here. Here we go.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Alright. Why don't you just-

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh, great. Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: -give him to me and... perfect.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: This is great.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You ready?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Excuse me.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: There we go.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Just do it.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I'll just stand here?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah, just keep your eye on Dwight, great.

Quote.Speaker: Photographer
Quote.Text: Sir, could you look into the camera?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Let's do it, shoot it.

Quote.Speaker: Photographer
Quote.Text: Sir.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Great.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Up here. [whistles]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Jim, right here, right here. [snaps fingers] Okay, good.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh, so that's it?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That's it.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: See? That wasn't so hard.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Cute kids, thanks for coming.

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Hello, Erin. Hello, everybody.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Uh, what? Why? Uh, hi honey. What- how are you doing?

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Hi, you know, my office got a call that they were shooting family portraits right here. And if there's one thing that every politician instinctively understands, it's a good photo op.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: [laughs] Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Heh.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Okay, you're going to go through the hallway. Here's a map. And if you get lost, just follow the blue line. [points to line on floor]

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Thanks.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Well, well, well. Senator Lipton, welcome. Angela.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Nice to see you. May I hold him?

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Sure.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: No. I am going to hold him because I haven't seen him all day.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I think that Dwight is doing this whole thing to, um, get a sample of my baby's DNA to prove he's the father. Which... is impossible... because the senator is the only man I've ever been with.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: [Phillip cries] See the duckie!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay, hold on for a second, folks. A few of the baby's hairs are out of place.

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Oh, thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: [slaps Dwight's hand away] No. No. I like the baby's hair the way it is.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Really?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: This is getting more and more delicious by the minute. [gargles alcohol, chokes, coughs] It's go time.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hey Nellie, I made soup - I made you some soup.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Well, I don't want any soup.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: But it's really good- [drops soup] Oh!

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Oh come on, Andy!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I know this is going to be a great payoff.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: A delicious moment.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: But after you're manager, some of these images are going to be hard to shake.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Well, but it-

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Just calibrate. Okay? Calibrate.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay, here we go. Oh, you know what? I don't want to throw a wrench in the works, but I want everything to be perfect and the baby's fingernails are just bothering me-

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Uh-uh, leave us alone.

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: I guess we're okay with the fingernails.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay, great. Suit yourself. Although, are those excess skin cells on the baby's cheek distracting to you as well?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Dwight, we're fine!

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Oopsie, did somebody make a boopsie?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Oh no. [laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: I'm just gonna take him out and change him just for a second.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: He defecated, aw.

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: You're stinky.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: A lot has changed since y'all left, okay? You're gonna have to jump through some hoops. And the new foreman is here. Now she's one of the best we've ever known, okay? So I need you to show her your upmost respect. Make sure she feels welcome and at home, okay? Can you do that?

Quote.Speaker: Brandon
Quote.Text: That's some pretty blatant complementing you're doing there, man. I don't even talk to her like that.

Quote.Speaker: Val
Quote.Text: Uh, Brandon?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I would.

Quote.Speaker: Brandon
Quote.Text: You would?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Brandon
Quote.Text: Sounds like you're trying to hit on my girlfriend.

Quote.Speaker: Val
Quote.Text: Calm down, he's not.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Yes, I am. Just so everyone's on the same page.

Quote.Speaker: Brandon
Quote.Text: [scoffs] So you really think she's gonna leave a guy who owns his own restaurant for a dude who ate his own restaurant?

Quote.Speaker: Val
Quote.Text: Brandon!

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Good slam.

Quote.Speaker: Brandon
Quote.Text: Thank you, Biggie.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Good luck to you.

Quote.Speaker: Brandon
Quote.Text: Oh, and have a burger for me.

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Okay, shall we take a few more?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I think we have all the shots we need. Thank you, Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Okay. There we go.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: No! Dwight! Give me the diaper! Dwight!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Is this what you were looking for? Huh? Huh?

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Andy, we wanted to talk to you. A lot of us are very concerned about you.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: You're dirty, you stink of booze, you're limping inexplicably.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I just want you guys not to worry. 'Cause old Andy's gonna be just fine.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No, no, see? This is what we're talking about. I mean, what was that accent? And last time I checked, you were drunk and now you're not drunk...

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: No, unfortunately it's true. He's been a nightmare. And the worst part is, he's been taking it out on me.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You hit her?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No. That is not the deal. Calibrate.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: He's not hitting me. But, he's been verbally abusing me-

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: That's not true either! That's also total- Everyone, please relax. I think you're gonna like this surprise guest.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: [enters] Happy birthday to Gabe!

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Oh, get out, skeleton man!

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: I can refer you to someone to talk to.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [his phone rings] Huh? Hold on.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Give you a name or-

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I just gonna- quick- [answers phone] Hello? Hey, what's the scoop? Are you close? What? No. no, no, no, no, no. You have to come now. Traffic clears? No, next Friday... that's not gonna work. Okay. Yeah. Okay. [inhales, hangs up] Damn it! Well, this is not going to be quite as delicious as I wanted, but I do have a very tasty announcement for you guys. Not only am I not a lowly janitor, I am the regional manager once again! Guys, I got my old job back!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh boy.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh, Andy.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I'm not crazy. I convinced David Wallace to give me my job back.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: David Wallace hasn't worked here in years.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Okay, yes, I see the confusion. I saw David at the fundraiser. He is now a multi-millionaire because he sold his toy vacuum "Suck It" to the U.S. military.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Andy, come on.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Even I know that's weird.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I- I- Okay, I get how that sounds crazy.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Hey, Andy, Nobody's calling you crazy, Andy. We're your friends, Andy.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Stop saying my name.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: No, he's not making this up.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Thank you, Erin.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Andy tells me about seeing David Wallace all the time.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: But have you ever actually seen him yourself?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Oh my God.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Erin, come- Come on. You know I've been talking to David Wallace.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Do you see David Wallace in the room right now?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [into phone] Operation Phoenix is a go. Just get the car ready.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Now you look at me like you're adoring me, I'm gonna look at the camera like I don't even know you're there.

Quote.Speaker: Ravi
Quote.Text: I do adore you.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Andrew, it's time for you to go home. You're better than this.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah, I know.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Everyone's better than this, because this is the worst thing I have ever seen. [drinks coconut penis energy drink] Why'd they add coconut? I miss original.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Others
Quote.Text: Hey!

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Hey guys, long time.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: David, what are you doing here?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Is it true you're buying the company?

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Okay, I guess the word is out. Uh, please keep this a secret, but yes, I've been talking with Andy-

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What? Thought I heard my name. What? I'm the new manager?

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: I'll get to that in a second, Andy.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: But it's- it is- it is me? Right?

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Yes, as we've discussed-

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: But it's very possible-

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oh my God!

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Probable.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Wow. From janitor to manager?

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Yep.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: That's quite a Cinderella story. From M-O-P to M-V-P.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: There's an official announcement, a few details to be-

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: From total loss to total boss, I mean-

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: Can we expect any payroll interruptions?

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Now that is a great question, Stanley. Right now I think all your operations or most of your operations are pretty much down in Florida, so to shift back up-

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I was so looking forward to that and it did not... go as I thought it would.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: So we're not gonna be a part of Sabre anymore?

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Actually, nothing is gonna be a part of Sabre anymore. Jo Bennett's planning on liquidating the rest of the company.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Oof. [laughs] Wouldn't wanna be a Sabre employee right about now. [laughs] I'm actually the CEO.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Ah, I didn't realize you were standing there.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Hey, my friend, trust me. This is for the best. I never understood that corporate mess.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Well, okay. Great to meet you.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Likewise, I'm Bob. Bob Kazamakis.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Pleasure.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: I'd love to give you a little rundown on what I've learned about this place.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: That's very gracious of you, Bob. I would love that.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Please. [laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Guess I'd better take off these dirty rags. Figure out how to be a manager of this place.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Perhaps your year of experience managing this branch will come in handy.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Gosh, I hope so.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: No! God, Mose! God!

Quote.Speaker: Mose
Quote.Text: Hi, Angela.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Get out of the car! Get out! Where is he?

Quote.Speaker: Mose
Quote.Text: I'm not supposed to say.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Yes! [slaps Mose] Tell me! Tell me where he is! Mose, damn it! Where did he go? Mose! Get back here!

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [taking photo with Jada] Let's see that smile. Go on. [waves to Val]

Quote.Speaker: Val
Quote.Text: [stands next to him] Right here?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Cool.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Looks like I might get my delicious moment after all.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: May I say one thing?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: It would be rude of me not to let you say whatever's on your mind.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: The quality of mercy is not strained.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: It droppeth as the gentle rain from heaven upon the place beneath.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Do not bring Shakespeare into this. How dare you play the bard card?

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: It blesseth he who gives and he who takes. 'Tis mightiest in the mightiest.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I just want one mother[bleep] delicious moment. Is that too much to ask?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: If I were to hire you back. If. What do you think you would do well?

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Special projects manager, that's my background. I just go around doing whatever I want.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: All right, you sly bastard. When can you start?

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Okay everyone. I had a conversation with Bob, and since I am going to be CEO now there'll be no need for him.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Ouch. That's gotta hurt!

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: But, he is going to be making so much money from the liquidation, he's gonna be freed up to do something much more important.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: David has generously offered to donate one million dollars in matching funds to a cause that's very dear to me. So, for the next three years, I'll be travelling overseas, concentrating all of my efforts on educating- mentoring, some African, some Asian, but mainly Eastern European women.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: I had no idea how pervasive this problem was until Bob explained it to me.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Oprah Winfrey's leadership academy and other schools like it, while wonderful, end with high school. I want to see these girls right through college, especially the gymnasts. They've lost so many years of crucial education to perfecting their bodies. Muscle groups the rest of us can't even fathom.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Gymnasts? You're going to seek out uneducated gymnasts?

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Yeah, so I'm hoping to identify some truly exceptional women who show great promise. Well, Andy, it's been fun.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Mm. Mm-hmm. [they hug, Robert kisses him on the lips]

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: It's been a great year.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hello.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Where is it?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: They're testing it now.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: How long does it take to get the results?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Seventy-two hours.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: You're gonna wait here?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yes. [Angela sits and holds his hand]

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: [Dwight kisses her] Dwight, I can't do this. Dwight!

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Senator Lipton. Hey, how are you?

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: You didn't call.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Um, well, uh, the issue that I- that concerned me...

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: You know what this is about. [covers Phillip's eyes] Call.
